## Form.(constructor)

Constructs a new Form instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(page?: string | HTMLElement);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | string \| HTMLElement | _(Optional)_ The HTML page or element associated with the form. |
